            <h3 class="headerMenuItem__parent--3Kg0H">
             Magazine
            </h3>
           </li>
           <li class="headerMenuItem__wrapper--3mUtz">
            <h3 class="headerMenuItem__parent--3Kg0H">
             Newsletters
            </h3>
           </li>
           <li class="headerMenuItem__wrapper--3mUtz">
            <h3 class="headerMenuItem__parent--3Kg0H">
             Events
            </h3>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="headerTemplate__userGreeting--625xY headerTemplate__aDesktopUserGreeting--c4tW5">
         <div class="userGreeting__wrapper--12jWF">
          <a class="userGreeting__button--3N_Dg" data-event-action="click" data-event-category="nav" data-event-label="sign-in" href="/login&amp;redirectTo=/">
           Sign in
          </a>

           Subscribe
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>

             <g transform="translate(768.000000, 2554.000000)">

         <li class="sidebar__widgetWrapper--PLzjV">
          <div class="magazineSidebar__wrap--3NWM6">
           <h3 class="heading__base--3BL90 heading__heading--hUYqy sidebarWidget__wrapper--1lDZi">
            <span>
             Magazine
            </span>
           </h3>
           <div class="magazineSidebar__row--WdQGm">
            <div class="magazineSidebar__imageWrap--3AbJv">
             <img alt="The progress issue" class="magazineSidebar__image--2ekgC" height="1406" src="https://wp.technologyreview.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/TR-Cover-MarchApril2021.jpg?w=1024" width="1024"/>
            </div>
            <div class="magazineSidebar__magMeta--1hnup">
             <h3 class="magazineSidebar__title--2YcM8">
              The progress issue
             </h3>
             <p>
              Our
              <a data-id="https://www.technologyreview.com/10-breakthrough-technologies-2021/" data-type="URL" href="https://www.technologyreview.com/10-breakthrough-technologies-2021/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">
               annual list of 10 breakthrough
              </a>
              <a data-id="https://www.technologyreview.com/2021/02/24/1014369/10-breakthrough-technologies-2021/" data-type="URL" href="https://www.technologyreview.com/2021/02/24/1014369/10-breakthrough-technologies-2021/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">
              </a>
              <a data-id="https://www.technologyreview.com/10-breakthrough-technologies-2021/" data-type="URL" href="https://www.technologyreview.com/10-breakthrough-technologies-2021/" rel="noreferrer noopener" target="_blank">
               technologies
              </a>
              shows areas in which lots of progress has been made. But by many other measures, theres still a long way to go.
             </p>
             <a class="magazineSidebar__link--IEUKc" href="https://www.technologyreview.com/magazines/the-progress-issue/">
              More issues
              <!-- -->
              &gt;
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li class="sidebar__widgetWrapper--PLzjV">
          <div class="ourTeamModule__moduleWrapper--2Cvtz">
           <h3 class="heading__base--3BL90 heading__heading--hUYqy sidebarWidget__wrapper--1lDZi">
            <span>
             Our Team
            </span>
           </h3>
           <ul>
            <li class="teamModuleItem__item--rVcqg">
             <div class="teamModuleItem__imageWrapper--1RHPn">
              <a href="https://www.technologyreview.com/author/gideon-lichfield/">
               <figure>
                <span class="image__wrapper--i55tn image__lazyload--1CqFg">
                 <img alt="Gideon Lichfield" class="image__placeholder--1CF-F" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7"/>
